name: Blockiverse
description:
Blockiverse is a multiplayer 3D game. The goal of this project is to give the player a complete universe, in which he can life.

Single- and multiplayer
Enjoy this game alone or in multiplayer. You have different social actions and relationships to other players and villagers.

Free editable vehicles
The user is free to build vehicles like he want.

Villages
Search villages and interact with villagers.

Caves
Explore caves to find more resources.

Flowing landscape
The landscape is flowing without unnatural and annoying steps or blocks.

Biomes
At the moment there are oceans, flatlands, hills and mountains.
